title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.171 - Invested capital
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.171 - Invested capital

State Regulations
(a) The amount
of capital contributed to a business by its owners; capital. (b) The amount so contributed, plus retained
earnings (or less accumulated losses) and appropriated surplus. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.171

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
